title: Finn B70 Straw Blower Dominic's Equipment Rental

subtasks: Get into the pick-up
Drive pick-up toward the field
Turn key in the ignition to start the engine
Adjust seat and mirrors for optimal driving position
Secure any items in the pick-up bed
Drive pick-up onto the farm property
Navigate through farm gates or entrances
Park pick-up in a strategic location for ease of access
Exit pick-up and walk into the field
Locate areas where water may gather or seep through
Inspect the sealant on the ground for cracks or gaps
Assess the effectiveness of the current sealant in preventing water infiltration
Identify the specific areas or structures requiring washing
Assemble cleaning supplies (e.g., hoses, brushes, cleaning solutions)
Mobilize to the affected area and set up the cleaning equipment
Apply cleaning solution to the surface to be washed
Scrub the surface thoroughly to remove contaminants
Rinse the surface with clean water
Inspect the washed area for cleanliness and ensure all residue is removed

tasks.task: Address the issue with PK anytime
subtasks: Identify the root cause of the problem ("PK anytime")
Determine the appropriate corrective action based on the assessment
Execute the necessary repairs or adjustments, possibly involving diagnostic tools
Test the resolved issue to confirm functionality
